content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services AI receptionist. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, Emily! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we're able to service your location?
Sure, I live at 987 Maple Street, Springfield.
Thank you. Let me check if that address is inside our service area.
Emily, it appears your address is outside our standard service area. However, we might still be able to assist you. Could you please specify the electrical issue you need help with?
Some wiring in my living room is flickering and sparking occasionally, which worries me.
Thanks for sharing the details. What would be your ideal time for the electrical service appointment?
Would tomorrow morning between 9 and 11 AM work?
Checking our availability for tomorrow morning now.
We have a slot available for tomorrow morning. I am attempting to book your appointment...

I'm sorry, Emily. It seems I am unable to book your appointment automatically due to your location being outside our service area. I will connect you to a human operator for further assistance. Please hold on.
reason: Booking failed due to outside service area

content: Hello Emily, this is Judy from XYZ Home Services. I see there was an issue with booking your appointment due to your address being outside our usual service area. Let me see what options we have for you.
Thanks, Judy. I really hope you can help!

Emily, I have confirmed with our dispatch team that we can make an exception and send a technician to your address tomorrow between 9 and 11 AM, but there will be an additional travel fee due to your location. Would you like me to proceed with the booking under these terms?
Okay, I didn't expect that, but I understand. Yes, please go ahead and book it.
Thank you, Emily. I am confirming the appointment now for tomorrow between 9 and 11 AM with the extra travel fee noted.
Your appointment is confirmed for tomorrow morning. We will send you a reminder before the technician arrives. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a nice day, Emily!
